form.description: Write a short description about your cosplay
form.vskit: Please insert link to virtual skit here.
form.rules: By submitting this application, I hereby acknowledge that I have read and understood the Competition Rules and agree to abide by all the requirements.  I also attest that all the information in the entry form is true and correct, and consent to the Cosplay being used by Vega Entertainment  for the purposes of the competition.

about.title: about us
about.description: Vega Entertainment is a Events & Exhibition Management Co. founded in 2019 Unique since we Design, Create, Produce Costumes that we are proud of to show in our Events. With a group of Saudi professionals focused on delivering Excellence, Combined with our local market expertise We  provide a full scale of management services in a way that makes any event come to life.

vision.description: To become the largest and widest cultural organizaion in the world, to suit the necessities of life and the aspirations of residents.

mission.description: Vega Entertainment strives to achieve a prominent presence in entertainment arenas of all sectors To represent entertainment within our dear kingdom in a way compatible with the rules of society alongside entertainment and with the urge to spread the spirit of initiative and encourgagement among young people.
